EmailTemplate.name: 10K Expert to Expert Feedback Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Feedback is Requested on {!Feedback__c.Expert__c} for {!Feedback__c.Project_Name__c} Project
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Feedback__c.Submitter__c},
Recently {!Feedback__c.Expert__c} completed work on {!Feedback__c.Project_Name__c} project. As a colleague, we'd like to ask for your feedback on how {!Feedback__c.Expert__c} performed and ask for your thoughts on how to improve on future projects.
The survey will only take 2-3 minutes and is totally confidential. Results will be used to identify performance trends, training needs, experts who have subject matter expertise and help us improve our project assignment process.
Click on this link to take the survey.
Take care when filling in the form as you will not be able to change your input after you've clicked on Submit.
Thank you for your help! 10K Delivery Team
